name: Pong HD
description:
This is a HD remake of the original classic game of Pong. One of the first video games to ever exist.

What is Pong:

Pong is a two-dimensional sports game that simulates table tenis. The player controls an in-game paddle by moving it vertically across the left or right side of the screen and there is a ball that randomly bounces around. They can compete with a friend to try and win the game by scoring as many points in the other players goal.

How to play:

You control a paddle vertically by using W and S. The other player controls the second paddle using UPARROW and DOWNARROW. There is a ball that randomly bounces around if the ball goes in your Goal the other player gets a point. First to 10 points wins. To defend your goal use your Paddle to make the ball bounce in the other direction and hopefully score.

Have fun and good luck!
